name: The FACE (Soggy Dog Games)
description:
A lighthearted survival horror game for windows involving a smiley face.

 Don't let its happy demeanour fool you. It follows you. It wants you. THE FACE IS COMING.

Collect coins, beat high scores and run away in this fast paced 2d game. Play in three different difficulties. Get past 100 in HARD MODE and you are officially a legend. If you like the game, please donate.
